trigger.h2

Class H2SampleTrigger

  • java.lang.Object
    • trigger.h2.H2SampleTrigger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.h2.api.Trigger

    public class H2SampleTrigger
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.h2.api.Trigger
    This sample application shows how to pass data to a trigger. Trigger data can be persisted by storing it in the database.
    Author:
    mbsusr01
